title: Remove background traffic and charging-station visuals from the landing hero

requirements.summary: Remove the car and bus background traffic elements/animations from the landing hero and delete any now-unused CSS keyframes/classes.
acceptanceCriteria: The landing hero no longer renders /assets/generated/car-sprite.dim_512x256.png.
The landing hero no longer renders /assets/generated/bus-sprite.dim_768x320.png.
No CSS keyframes/classes remain that are only used for the removed car/bus animations (e.g., slide-right)

file_operations.description: Remove the background traffic elements that reference /assets/generated/car-sprite.dim_512x256.png and /assets/generated/bus-sprite.dim_768x320.png, and delete the now-unused slide-right animation usage and associated @keyframes from the component-scoped

requirements.summary: Remove the charging station element and any charging/driving sequence UI/animation logic from the landing hero.
acceptanceCriteria: The landing hero no longer renders /assets/generated/charger-station.dim_512x512.png.
The landing hero no longer shows the 'Charging...' label or the charging progress animation.

Any now-unused React state/effects/refs related only to the removed charging/driving sequence are removed (e.g., animationPhase/canvasRef/useEffect), and the component compiles cleanly with no unused-variable lint/type errors

file_operations.description: Remove the charger station that references /assets/generated/charger-station.dim_512x512.png, remove the charging progress UI (including the 'Charging...' label) and any related animation classes/keyframes (e.g., charge). Delete any now-unused React state/effects/refs/imports used only for the charging/driving sequence (e.g., animationPhase, canvasRef, useEffect/useRef/useState if no longer needed) so the component compiles without unused-variable errors.
